definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: foreign, alien (NH [[נׇכְרִי]] = Gentile);—´[[נ]] abs. m. Zep 1:8 +; f. [[נׇכְרִיׇּה]] Ex 2:22 +; mpl. [[נׇכְרִים]] Is 2:6 + 2 t. + Pr 20:16 Kt (> Qr [[נׇכְרִיׇּה]]), + Pr 27:13 (so read for MT [[נׇכְרִיׇּה]]); fpl. [[נׇכְרִיּוֹת]] Ge 31:15 +;—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: foreign: [[עַם נׇכְרִי]] Ex 21:8 (E) a foreign (non-Isr.) people, ´[[אִישׁ נ]] De 17:15 (‖[[לאׁ]] [[אָתִיְ]]); ´[[מַלְבּוּשׁ נ]] Zep 1:8; [[אֶרֶץ נׇכְרִיׇּה]] Ex 2:22 (J) foreign land, so Ex 18:3 (E); esp. [[נׇשִׁים נׇכְרִיּוֹת]] foreign (non-Isr.) women 1Ki 11:18, Ezr 10:2, Ezr 10:10, Ezr 10:11, Ezr 10:14, Ezr 10:17, Ezr 10:18, Ezr 10:44, Ne 13:26, Ne 13:27.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: as subst. [[נׇכְרִי]] foreigner (non-Isr.) Ju Jdg 19:12 (+ [[אֲשֶׁר לאׁ מִבְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל]]), 1Ki 8:41 (+ [[אֲשֶׁר לאׁ מֵעַמְְּ]]), = 2Ch 6:32 (+ id.), 1Ki 8:43 = 2Ch 6:33, De 14:21 (‖[[גֵּר]]), De 15:3, De 23:21 (opp. [[אָחִיְ]]), De 29:21 (+ [[אֲשֶׁר יׇבאׁ מֵאֶרֶץ רְחוֹקָה]]); as predicate, 2Sa 15:19 (‖[[גּׁלֶה]]), [[נׇכְרִיׇּה]] Ru 2:10; pl. [[נׇכְרִים]] foreigners La 5:2 ([[זׇרִים]]), Ob:Ob 11 (‖ id.); cf. [[יַלְדֵי נׇכְרִים]] Is 2:6; fpl. alien women Ge 31:15 (E; i.e. not of one's father's family).

[[נׇכְרִיׇּה]] foreign woman, as term. techn., in Pr, for harlot (perh. because harlots were orig. chiefly foreigners): Pr 2:16 (‖[[אִשָּׁה זׇרָה]]), Pr 7:5 (‖ id.), Pr 5:20 (‖[[זׇרָה]]), Pr 6:24 (‖[[אֵשֶׁת רָָע]]), Pr 23:27 (‖[[זוֹנׇה]]).—On Pr 20:16, Pr 27:13 v. infr.

fig. unknown, unfamiliar: [[נׇכְרִי הָיִיתִי בְּעֵינֵיהֶם]] Job 19:15 an alien am I become in their eyes; [[לִבְנֵי אִמִּי]] ´[[נ]] Ps 69:9 (‖[[מוּזׇר הָיִיתִי לְאֶחָָי]]); ´[[אִישׁ נ]] Ec 6:2; of ´[[י]]'s judgment, [[נׇכְרִיׇּה עֲבׂדָתוֹ]] Is 28:21 strange is his task! (‖[[זׇר מַעֲשֵׂהוּ]]); [[גֶּפֶן נׇכְרִיׇּה]] Je 2:21 an alien vine (opp. [[זֶרַע אֱמֶת]]), fig. of degenerate Israel; as subst., [[נׇכְרִים]] Pr 20:16 Kt (> Qr [[נׇכְרִיׇּה]]), alens, persons unknown to him (‖[[זׇר]]), so read also (for MT [[נׇכְרִיׇּה]]) ‖ Pr 27:13.
